resources.string:
Hi, my name is Aleksei.

 I love to cook, and I really love to listen death metal.
 My favorite dish is russian salad.
 Favorite band - Dead Can Dance.
 (I know, DCD is not a death metal band, but they are amazing, anyway)

 If I ate everything, that I can, and have nothing to listen, I like to roam somewhere, where I can see birds.

 I like to listen birds, not eat. (the voices of magpies are similar for blast beats, you know)
